patterns: can i get the contact details
Can you give me the contact of an executive?
What is the help desk phone number?
Can you give me your number
Can i get the customer care number?
Can I get help desk number
I want to speak to someone.
Is there a phone number to call?
responses: You can contact us at contact@chickeninn.com, our help desk number is 0712345678.

patterns: what is the address of the restaurant
I am not able to locate you
Can i have the address of the restaurant
what is the address of this restaurant?
responses: You can locate us at KFC, Kimathi Street, opposite Nation Center, Nairobi

patterns: Am i talking to a bot
Can i have your name please
responses: You can call me KFCbot.
I'm KFCbot!
I'm KFCbot.

patterns: Are you open on all days?
are you guys open on all weekdays?
responses: We are open 10am-12am Monday-Friday!

patterns: could i get something to eat
responses: Great! You can place your order by calling our hotline, visiting our website or using our mobile app. Would you like me to connect you with an agent?

patterns: What do you have to eat?
responses: We have a chicken sandwich, a spicy sandwich, and a grilled sandwich on our menu. Which one would you like to know more about?

patterns: Tell me about the chicken sandwich
How much is the chicken sandwich?
responses: Our chicken sandwich is made with a crispy chicken fillet, lettuce, and mayo on a sesame seed bun. It costs $4.99.

patterns: How much does the spicy sandwich cost?
responses: Our spicy sandwich is made with a spicy chicken fillet, lettuce, and mayo on a sesame seed bun. It costs $5.99.

patterns: How much is the grilled sandwich?
Can I order the grilled sandwich?
responses: Our grilled sandwich is made with a grilled chicken fillet, lettuce, and mayo on a sesame seed bun. It costs $4.99.
We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
responses: Delivery around CBD is free and will take approximately 1-2hrs
Delivery outside CBD and other counties will take 1-2 days
